mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO `qy_method_statistics_log_${currentDate}` ( server_name, method_name, method_count, method_sum_time, statistics_interval, create_time ) VALUES
( #{item.serverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.methodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.methodCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.methodSumTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.statisticsInterval,jdbcType=INTEGER}, now() )
